name: telegramTrigger
description: Starts the workflow on a Telegram update

properties.name: telegramTriggerNotice
properties.displayName: Due to Telegram API limitations, you can use just one Telegram trigger for each bot at a time

options.name: Callback Query
options.description: Trigger on new incoming callback query

options.name: Channel Post
options.description: Trigger on new incoming channel post of any kind — text, photo, sticker, etc

options.name: Edited Channel Post
options.description: Trigger on new version of a channel post that is known to the bot and was edited

options.name: Edited Message
options.description: Trigger on new version of a channel post that is known to the bot and was edited

options.name: Inline Query
options.description: Trigger on new incoming inline query

options.name: Message
options.description: Trigger on new incoming message of any kind — text, photo, sticker, etc

options.name: Poll
options.description: Trigger on new poll state. Bots receive only updates about stopped polls and polls, which are sent by the bot.

options.name: Pre-Checkout Query
options.description: Trigger on new incoming pre-checkout query. Contains full information about checkout.

options.name: Shipping Query
options.description: Trigger on new incoming shipping query. Only for invoices with flexible price.

properties.name: attachmentNotice
properties.displayName: Every uploaded attachment, even if sent in a group, will trigger a separate event. You can identify that an attachment belongs to a certain group by media_group_id .

options.name: download
options.description: Telegram delivers the image in multiple sizes. By default, just the large image would be downloaded. If you want to change the size, set the field 'Image Size'.

options.name: imageSize
options.description: The size of the image to be downloaded

options.name: chatIds
options.description: The chat IDs to restrict the trigger to. Multiple can be defined separated by comma.

options.name: userIds
options.description: The user IDs to restrict the trigger to. Multiple can be defined separated by comma.
